rule.title: Post a message to Slack on all new errors
rule.query: (isNew:true AND (severity:Error OR severity:Fatal)) OR applicationName.raw:"Uptime Monitoring"

then.body: {"text":"<https://app.elmah.io/errorlog/error?logid=$logId&id=$id|New $severity in $logName>","attachments":[{"fallback":"$detailJSON","color":"$severityHex","callback_id":"elmahio_actions","mrkdwn_in":["fields"],"fields":[{"title":"Message","value":"$message","short":false},{"title":"Type","value":"$typeMarkdown","short":false},{"title":"Application","value":"$applicationName","short":false},{"title":"URL","value":"$methodMarkdown $url :arrow_right: $statusCodeMarkdown","short":false},{"value":"$detailJSON","short":false}],"actions":[{"name":"hide","text":"Hide","type":"button","value":"hide;$logIdEncrypted;$id"},{"name":"fix","text":"Mark as fixed","type":"button","value":"fix;$logIdEncrypted;$id"},{"name":"delete","text":"Delete","type":"button","value":"delete;$logIdEncrypted;$id","style":"danger","confirm":{"title":"Are you sure?","text":"Would you like to delete this message? Both message on elmah.io and this Slack message will be deleted.","ok_text":"Yes","dismiss_text":"No"}}]}]}
